message: I'm willing to take the risk, I'll buy the product.
I'd like to buy the product, but only if you're willing to reveal the product's quality after my decision, regardless of whether I buy or pass.
I'd like to buy the product, despite your recommendation. I'm aware of the low sales of high-quality products so far, but I'm willing to take the risk.
I'd like to know the probability of a high-quality product being offered to me, based on the previous sales record.
I'd like to buy the product, even though you don't recommend it. Given that 3 out of 3 products have been low-quality, I'm going to take a chance and buy it.

I'd like to pass on the product. Given that none of the previous 4 buyers purchased the product after Alice's recommendation, I'm suspicious that Alice is recommending low-quality products to encourage sales. I'd like to see more information about the products sold before making a decision.
I'd like to know the reason behind your recommendation. Is it based on the statistics, or is there something else I should consider?
I'd like to buy the product, but I'm not sure if I should trust your recommendation. Can you explain why you don't recommend it?
I'd like to know the probability of the product being high-quality based on the current statistics. Can you provide that?

I'd like to pass on this product. Given that 5 previous buyers have passed on the product despite your recommendation, it seems that your recommendations are not reliable indicators of product quality. I'll take a chance and pass on this one.
I'd like to pass on this product. Based on the fact that you didn't recommend it, I'm assuming it's a low-quality product. I'd like to wait for the next product and see if you'll recommend it.
I'd like to buy the product, but only if I can see the product before I make the purchase. I'd like to inspect it before committing to the sale.

I'd like to pass on the product. Given that 6 out of 6 previous buyers received low-quality products (since no high-quality products have been sold), I'm going to assume the product is likely low-quality. I'd like to wait for a high-quality product to be offered.
I'm not convinced by your recommendation, Alice. Can you explain why you think this product is not worth buying?
Alice, I'm not going to buy the product. Your previous recommendations don't seem very reliable.
I'd like to pass on this product based on your recommendation. Can you tell me more about the previous sales record?
I'd like to buy the product, despite your recommendation. I'm willing to take the risk.
I'm not convinced by your recommendation, but I'd like to know the probability of the product being high quality based on the previous sales record.
I'm willing to take the risk, given that 7 buyers have already passed on the product and I'm the 8th buyer. The probability of a high-quality product remaining is still 33.33%.
